name: Implement Login Feature
shortdescription: Create a login page for users
description: Develop a user authentication system that allows users to log in with their email and password.

name: Set Up Database
shortdescription: Configure and initialize the database for the application
description: Set up the MySQL database schema and establish connections with the application.

name: Create API Documentation
shortdescription: Document the API endpoints for developers
description: Write clear and comprehensive documentation for the API endpoints, including request and response examples.

name: Implement User Profile Page
description: Create an interface that allows users to view and edit their profile information.

name: Write Unit Tests
shortdescription: Create unit tests for critical components
description: Implement unit tests for the authentication and database interaction components to ensure reliability.

name: Design Landing Page
description: Design and develop a landing page that showcases the application’s features and benefits.

name: Setup CI/CD Pipeline
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployment of the application.

name: Conduct User Testing
shortdescription: Gather feedback from users on usability
description: Organize a user testing session to gather feedback on the application’s usability and features.

name: Optimize Performance
description: Analyze application performance and implement optimizations to improve loading times and responsiveness.

name: Prepare Release Notes
shortdescription: Draft release notes for the upcoming version
description: Create release notes that summarize the features and bug fixes included in the upcoming version of the application.
